body: The suggestion to use cuda() seems very odd from my perspective, because I shouldn't be calling __cuda_array_interface__ unless I *knew* that the tensor was a CUDA tensor. If I am calling it on a non-CUDA tensor... well, there is certainly an error, but the fact that you don't have a CUDA tensor doesn't seem like the most salient one.
